# About the project

This is the Introduction to Open Data Science course by Kimmo Vehkalahti & co.
    
This course consists of seven sections and every section has it´s weekly exercises.

1. Tools and methods for open and reproducible research
2. Regression and model validation
3. Logistic regression
4. Clustering and classification Not available
5. Dimensionality reduction techniques Not available
6. Multivariate statistical modelling Not available
7. Final assignment

We are using GitHub to share our work. My repository you can find [here](https://github.com/miuva/IODS-project) 
